title: Bugs
description: Track bugs discovered during implementation
close_reason: Found and documented Playwright incompatibility: Playwright 1.56+ fails to launch VSCode (--remote-debugging-port issue). Downgrading to 1.43.1 allows launch but window detection fails - VSCode opens successfully but Playwright reports 0 windows. Root cause: VSCode multi-process architecture incompatible with Playwright Electron API window tracking.

title: Investigate Playwright window detection for VSCode
description: VSCode launches successfully with Playwright 1.43.1 but electronApp.windows() returns 0. Need to investigate VSCode's multi-process architecture and find workaround for window detection.
close_reason: Fixed Playwright window detection. Root cause: VSCode requires specific launch arguments to run properly. Added --no-sandbox, --disable-gpu-sandbox, --disable-updates, --skip-welcome, --skip-release-notes, --disable-workspace-trust, --extensionDevelopmentPath, --user-data-dir, and --extensions-dir. VSCode now launches successfully and all 3 Playwright tests pass.
